summary: Comprehensive testing of Goals page features completed successfully. All backend APIs (14/14 tests passed) and frontend UI flows working correctly. Features tested: login, goal creation, AI breakdown, subtask management, progress logging, streak tracking, mark complete/reopen, and delete.
passed_tests: Goals page loads correctly after login - PASSED
Create new goal via 'New Goal' button - PASSED
Goal cards display with progress bar and streak indicator - PASSED
Click on goal card opens detail modal - PASSED
AI goal breakdown (Break goal into steps) button generates subtasks - PASSED
Toggle subtask completion updates progress - PASSED
Log progress with minutes and note - PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: Goals.js is well-structured with proper data-testid attributes for testing
GoalModal component handles all goal operations correctly
AI breakdown endpoint properly integrates with emergentintegrations LLM
Progress calculation from subtasks works correctly
seed_data_creation: Test goals created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Goals page fully functional. All CRUD operations, AI breakdown, subtasks, progress logging, and streak tracking working. Test user goaltest@test.com available for future testing.

goal_creation.details: New Goal dialog opens, form fields work, goal created with toast notification

goal_cards.details: Cards display title, description, progress bar, streak indicator (ðŸ”¥)

goal_detail_modal.details: Modal opens on card click, shows all goal details

ai_breakdown.details: AI generates 4-7 actionable subtasks, displayed with checkboxes

subtask_toggle.details: Checkbox toggles update subtask completion and recalculate progress

progress_logging.details: Minutes and note logged, streak incremented, history displayed

mark_complete.details: Goal moves to Completed section with checkmark icon

reopen_goal.details: Button changes to 'Reopen Goal' for completed goals
